backend/main.mo: Runs the migration module and defines an empty actor.
backend/migration.mo: Migration stub that returns state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping build issues to related frontend config files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and loading the React app with Inter font and SEO tags.
frontend/postcss.config.cjs: CommonJS PostCSS config enabling Tailwind and autoprefixer plugins.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering hero, sections, navigation, menu grids, and reveal-on-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/LocationMapPrevi: Map preview with iframe embed, loading state, and fallback card if embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryGrid: Displays a menu category with its image and items in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Renders a menu item with image, prices, and a WhatsApp order button if configured.
frontend/src/components/RevealableSectio: Wrapper that hides or reveals a section based on state while preserving navigation IDs.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a fallback source on load failure.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Generic layout section with optional muted background styling.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo and navigation, including mobile menu toggling and section navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Centralized business configuration defining branding, contact info, hours, map URLs, WhatsApp settings, and menu categories with images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query backend hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections: Tracks which page sections are revealed and provides utilities to reveal and smoothly scroll to sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for dark and light modes with premium shadow and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp order links using menu item details and checks whether WhatsApp ordering is configured.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current state of a singleâ€‘page marketing site including new requirements for unique menu item images and WhatsApp ordering. Lists architectural notes, known issues, and existing features relevant to branding, layout, and menu rendering.
